GRAND RAPIDS, MI, 49505-5904
Re: License #: CB410201176
Dear Carter Monique:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced agency completed on
6/10/2024. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with applicable
licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager, Samantha Way, at (517) 243-9743.
Sincerely,
Melinda Gubbins, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
701 S. Elmwood, Ste. 11
Traverse City, MI 49684
(231) 342-3721

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The agency is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was offered technical assistance in the following areas:
• There was no technical assistance provided or requested.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was offered consultation in the following areas:
• There was no consultation requested or required.
VI. EVALUATION OF PERIOD UNDER REVIEW
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
There were no incidents of substantiated corporal punishment during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans during
this period under review.
2

Chief Administrator Assessment
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans during
this period under review. The agency has not had any independent living
placements but is interested in learning more about contracted independent living
services.
Financial Overview
There were no financial concerns identified based on the review of the agency's
budget and audit.
Staff Interviews
An interview was conducted with one staff member face-to-face at the agency.
Staff reported feeling supported by the agency. The agency fosters working
together to achieve goals. There were no concerns reported.
Description of Agency Walk Through
The agency maintains sufficient office space, equipment and supplies to ensure
delivery of independent living services. All files were stored securely.
VII. FIELD ANALYST FINDINGS
The agency does not certify foster homes, therefore, does not have an assigned
agency analyst.
VIII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. It is recommended that the agency continue on their
regular license.
______6/14/2024_____________________________
